p:
According to the work environment, the process noise sequences and observation noise sequences can be set as random constant-mean Gaussian white noise sequences. Then, we establish a process noise covariance
Q k
and system noise (measured noise of UWB positioning system) variance
R k
. Throughout the filtering process, the system processes are not related to the noise or noise sequences, i.e., the initial state
x 0
,
y 0
of the system is not related to the noise or noise sequences. The initial state of the robot positioning coordinates,
x 0
,
y 0
, and the initial filtering error value
P 0
are known [ 19].
